mapper.select: select bno, title, userid, thumbs, views, regdate from board order by bno desc limit #{stbno}, 25

select bno, title, userid, thumbs, views, regdate from board
where ${ftype} like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%')
where title like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%')
order by bno desc limit #{stbno}, 25

select ceil(count(bno)/25) cnt from board
where ${ftype} like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%')
where title like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{fkey}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, userid, content) values (#{title}, #{userid}, #{content});
mapper.update: update board set views = views + 1 where bno = #{bno}
